name: COUPON QUEST: iOS Game that Rewards Players with Real Stuff
blurb: Coupon Quest is an iOS/Android game where players can venture through a virtual realm on a quest to collect real coupons.

rewards.reward: Get the game for FREE when it's released! We'll be sure to email you instructions on how to download the game as soon as it launches. You'll also get your name in the FELLOWSHIP OF THE COUPON list in the game\u2019s credits!
Become a COUPON CRUSADER and receive the game before anyone else! Plus receive a place in the FELLOWSHIP OF THE COUPON.

Show off your COUPON CRUSADER status to the peasants in your village with a WALLPAPER for your device\u2019s desktop. That\u2019ll let everyone know you\u2019re into the beta test and a part of the FELLOWSHIP OF THE COUPON.

Want more traffic to your website? We'll place an ad for your website inside the game. Your ad (Ad Square) will be a part of the game itself, acting as a direct link to your site, and will stay active for 6 months. Coupon Quest is a brand new app and can potentially attract millions of users. So be one of the first businesses to sponsor Coupon Quest at this limited time, discounted rate!
Strike fear in the hearts of over-pricing merchants in your kingdom with a COUPON QUEST T-SHIRT, along with all the above.

Are you a business? Promote your store to mobile users in your area by placing your ad inside Coupon Quest. Your brand can be displayed on one of the Ad Squares in the game for 1 year \u2013 acting as a link to your business\u2019s website. You\u2019re even important enough to get a T-Shirt AND a Wallpaper, plus all the above.

Your customers are on-the-go, so make your ads mobile. Let our professional copywriter and art director create your ad inside the Coupon Quest game. Our creative team will consult with you through email or phone, send you mock-ups of your ad for your approval, and place your ad inside the game for 1 year. Plus all the above.

Name and create your own in-game character with our writers and designers, plus the T-shirt, Wallpaper and place in the FELLOWSHIP OF THE COUPON. You can create a beautiful pixie to look like your girlfriend, or a brave paladin to look like your brother, or even a wart-faced troll to look like your ex-boyfriend. We'll also give you a T-Shirt, Wallpaper, and the game for FREE!

Want to buy more Ad Squares and increase mobile traffic to your website? Secure 5 Ad Squares in the game for 1 year, making the chances of users seeing your ad 5 times greater. You'll also get consulting from our professional advertising team via email or phone. We'll brainstorm with you, get to know your brand, and come up with some cool ad mock-ups for you to choose from. Plus you get the T-Shirt, Wallpaper, and place in the FELLOWSHIP OF THE COUPON.

Do you have an online store? That\u2019s perfect. Connect your website to a large network of mobile users across North America by securing 20 Ad Squares in the game for 1 year. Our professional advertising team will also call you directly to create a marketing strategy and some ad samples for you to choose from. Once you're happy with an ad we've created for you, we'll place 20 of those ads inside the game for 1 year. You'll also be named an official sponsor with your logo featured on the Coupon Quest website along with a professionally written press release announcing your generous support to our small start-up.

Serious support receives serious rewards. Consumer-minded mobile customers will be playing Coupon Quest, so make sure they see your brand. We\u2019ll create 50 Ad Squares inside the game with your name brand on them. All 50 of your Ad Squares will be placed in the game for 1 year and act as direct links to your website. We'll even phone you personally to customize your mobile marketing strategy and create your ads from scratch. You get all this, plus your logo featured as an official sponsor on the Coupon Quest website along with a press release written by our professional copywriter, announcing your huge support to our little dream.
